entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
